column1: 411712,Disabilities Services Officer,,"Collaborate with other professionals to assess client needs or plan treatments
column3: Counsel clients or patients with substance abuse issues
column5: Support individuals with diverse needs to understand, access and utilise information or services
column7: Develop treatment plans for patients or clients
column9: Intervene in crisis situations to assist clients
column11: Modify treatment plans to accommodate client needs
column13: Deliver inclusive and accessible programs, policies or services
column15: Counsel family members of clients or patients
column17: Complete documentation required by programs or regulations
column19: Refer clients to community or social service programs
column21: Refer individuals to educational or work programs
column23: Maintain a working understanding of the cultural, diversity and accessibility needs of others, and how this applies to the role
column25: Monitor clients to evaluate treatment progress
column29: Supervise workers providing client or patient services
column31: Plan programs to address community health issues
column33: Evaluate potential problems in home or work environments of clients
column35: Interview clients to gather information about their backgrounds, needs or progress
column41: Advise others on social or educational issues",0.1001848073501731
